metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36084 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
The CIL compiler in SELinux 3.2 has a use-after-free in__cil_verify_classperms (called from __cil_verify_classpermission and__cil_pre_verify_helper).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsepol2 - 3.3-1
sepol-utils - 3.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsepol package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3-1').
